#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int mp[100][100];
bool rnr[100][200];

bool getthr(int u, bool seen[], int match[], int s)
{
    for(int i=0;i<s;i++)
    {
        if(rnr[u][i] && !seen[i])
        {
            seen[i]=1;
            if(match[i]<0 || getthr(match[i],seen,match,s))
            {
                match[i] = u;
                return 1;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

bool doit(int tm, int n, int m, int k, int c)
{
    int i,j;

    memset(rnr,0,sizeof(rnr));
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        for(j=0;j<m;j++)
        {
            if(mp[i][j]<=tm)
                rnr[i][j]=1;
            if(mp[i][j]+c<=tm)
                rnr[i][m+j]=1;
        }

    int match[2*m];
    memset(match,-1,sizeof(match));

    int flow = 0;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        bool seen[2*m];
        memset(seen,0,sizeof(seen));

        if(getthr(i,seen,match,2*m))
            flow++;
    }

    return (flow>=k);
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,m,k,c;
    int hi,lo,mid,ans;
    int i,j;

    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        hi=lo=0;
        scanf("%d%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k,&c);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            for(j=0;j<m;j++)
            {
                scanf("%d",&mp[i][j]);
                hi = max(hi,mp[i][j]+c);
            }

        while(lo<=hi)
        {
            mid = lo+(hi-lo)/2;
            if(doit(mid,n,m,k,c))
            {
                ans = mid;
                hi=mid-1;
            }
            else
                lo=mid+1;
        }
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
